title: Fran & Ria from ‘Chicks in the Office’ Break Down Bachelor Nation
description:
Fran and Ria from “Chicks in the Office” stop by “Bachelor Happy Hour” this week to share all their opinions on the nonstop roller coaster that is Bachelor Nation.  

In their conversation with ​Becca and Michelle, Fran and Ria discuss how “The Bachelor” franchise became such a major part of “Chicks in the Office,” who from Bachelor Nation has surprised them the most in real life, and why they prefer a drama-filled season over a straightforward love story.  

Then, nothing is off the table in a round of “Bachelor”-themed rapid-fire questions where Fran and Ria reveal which couples they wish were still together and what they rank as the most WTF moment in “Bachelor” history.  

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
